en.title: Lesson 3 - git status, git add & git commit (Deep Understanding)
en.subtitle: In this lesson you will completely understand how Git tracks changes internally.

sections.title: Why This Lesson Is Extremely Important
sections.description: Most developers use git status, git add and git commit every single day. If you fully understand only these three commands, you can already work on real projects confidently.
points: git status shows the current state of your project.
git add decides what will go into the next commit.
git commit permanently stores your changes into Git history.
These three commands control the entire Git workflow.

rows: Shows what Git is tracking right now

sections.title: git status – The Most Important Command
sections.description: git status tells you everything about your working directory and staging area.

rows: Git does not know these files yet
Files are modified but not staged

sections.note: Professional developers run git status multiple times while working.
sections.warning: Never commit without checking git status first.

sections.title: git add – Moving Changes to Staging Area
sections.description: git add does not commit your file. It only prepares the file for commit.
points: Only staged files will be committed

rows: Stages all files in current directory

sections.note: Staging area is like a selection basket for your commit.

sections.title: git commit – Saving a Permanent Snapshot
sections.description: git commit takes whatever is in the staging area and saves it permanently into the Git history.
points: Each commit has a unique hash ID
Commits are immutable (cannot be changed easily)
sections.note: Never write useless commit messages like 'update' or 'changes'.

sections.title: Common Beginner Mistakes
points: Not checking git status before commit
sections.warning: Bad commits in production projects can cause serious issues.

ta.title: பாடம் 3 - git status, git add, git commit
ta.subtitle: இந்த பாடத்தில் Git வேலை செய்யும் முறையை முழுமையாக புரிந்து கொள்வீர்கள்.

sections.title: இந்த மூன்று command-கள் ஏன் முக்கியம்?
points: git status – project-ன் தற்போதைய நிலை காட்டும்
git commit – permanent history-ல save பண்ணும்
sections.note: இந்த மூன்று command-களை சரியாக தெரிந்தால் Git-ல் நீங்க strong.
